path: PDF Library/Graphics Documentation/How to Map Q Drive User.docx
text: Mapping Q drive for User GFX Path : \\artworksnyc.nbcuni.ge.com\VizRT_OnAir To map a drive in windows, open up My Computer\This PC so you are looking at all the drives on the machine. Click on Map Network Drive. This will permanently map the drive for future use. Fill in the Drive as Q: drive and paste the above path in the Folder. By clicking reconnect at sign in you will automatically be connected to the drive on boot, which is necessary for operators. There should be no log in credentials required. Click finish.
